general_advisory: Based on the weather forecast, farmers can continue intercultural operations, harvesting, and pesticide application. Start field preparation for rabi crops. Transplant seedlings and monitor insect pests for control strategies.

advisory: Apply Tricyclazole for neck blast disease
Control steam borer & leaf folder with chlorpyriofos/profenofos
Spray Imidachloprid to control BPH
For ear-cutting caterpillar, spray Quinalphos or Chlorpyriphos at the root zone
Apply Flubendiamide to control American Cob Borer infestation
Current weather is favorable for sowing Horse gram & Bengal gram
Start land preparation and sowing
Use suitable mustard varieties
Spray neem oil to control insects at seedling stage
Weed and apply urea and MoP per acre
Apply mulching
Prepare nursery beds with well-decomposed FYM and chlorpyriphos dust
Transplant seedlings of recommended varieties
Prepare nursery beds as for cauliflower
Transplant seedlings of recommended varieties
Complete 3rd weeding and top dressing
Soil drenching to control rhizome rot
Remove infected plants
Regularly check for dehydration, heat stress, and parasitic infections
Deworm and vaccinate as needed
